Feature Notes:

Darkvision: R60' See one light level better
Exceptional Training: Companion can Dash, Disengage, or Help instead of Attack; attacks count as magical
Martial Versatility: Replace Fighting Style or maneuver when boosting ability or taking feat
Ranger's Companion: Companion beast up to CR 1/4 gains +4 AC, attack, damage, skills, and saving throws and obeys self commands
Telepathic: R60' Speak telepathically

Combat
Hit Points: 60 Initiative: 3 Armor Class: 13 Attacks Per Round: 2
Armor Proficiency: Medium; Shield Weapon Proficiency: Firearms; Martial
Armor: None Shield: None Weapons: Blowgun: 1 (+9 1d1+3 R25/100); Greatclub: 1 (+7 1d8+3); Mace: 1 (+7 1d6+3); Unarmed: 1 (+7 1d1+3)
Combat Notes:
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +20
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +3
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +3
Dexterity Damage Adjustment: +3
Extra Attack: +1 Attacks Per Round
Fighting Style (Archery): +2 ranged attacks
Strength Attack Adjustment: +3
Strength Damage Adjustment: +3
Crusher: Bludgeoning hit moves foe 5'; critical hit gives allies Adv on attacks for 1 rd
Favored Foe: Hit on marked foe inflicts +1d6 HP weapon damage for conc or 1 min 4/long rest
Fighting Style (Dueling): +2 damage with single, one-handed weapon
Gunner: Attacks not slowed by loading, no Disadv on ranged attacks w/in 5' of foe
Piercer: Additional piercing critical hit die, reroll 1 piercing damage die 1/rd
Poisoner: Ignore poison resistance, coat weapon w/poison for 1 min (inflicts +2d8 HP poison and poisoned condition (DC 14 Con neg) for 1 rd)
Slasher: Slashing damage inflicts -10 Speed for 1 rd; critical hit inflicts Disadv on attacks for 1 rd
Telekinetic (Charisma): R30' Telepathic shove moves target 5' (DC 13 Str neg)
Telekinetic (Intelligence): R30' Telepathic shove moves target 5' (DC 12 Str neg)
Telekinetic (Wisdom): R30' Telepathic shove moves target 5' (DC 15 Str neg)
Tireless: Self gains 1d8+3 temporary HP 4/long rest, short rest reduces exhaustion by 1
Save Proficiency: Dexterity; Strength
Save: Charisma: 1; Constitution: 2; Dexterity: 7; Intelligence: 0; Strength: 7; Wisdom: 3
Save Notes:
Fey Ancestry: Adv on saves vs. charm, immunity to sleep
Land's Stride: Adv on saves vs. impeding plants
Magic
Spell Slots: A0: 2; A1: 1; R1: 4; R2: 3; R3: 2 Attack: A: 4; R: 7 Spell DC: A: 12; R: 15
Spells:
Beast Sense (R2 Divi): Self perceives through touched beast's senses for conc or 1 hr
Cordon Of Arrows (R2 Tran): R5' Four pieces of ammo attack w/in 30', inflict 1d6 HP piercing (Dex neg) for 8 hr
Cure Wounds (R1 Evoc): Touched regains 1d8+3 HP
Disguise Self (A1 Illu): Self clothing and body appear different for 1 hr
Elemental Weapon (R3 Tran): Touched weapon gains +1 attack and +1d4 HP acid, cold, fire, lightning, or thunder for conc or 1 hr
Ensnaring Strike (R1 Conj): Successful attack restrains foe and inflicts 1d6 HP/tn piercing (Str neg) for conc or 1 min
Find Traps (R2 Divi): R120' Self senses presence of traps
Fog Cloud (R1 Conj): R120' 20' radius obscures vision for conc or 1 hr
Plant Growth (R3 Tran): R150' Overgrows 100' radius or enriches 1/2 mile radius for 1 yr
Ray Of Frost (A0 Evoc): R60' Ranged spell inflicts 1d8 HP cold and -10' Speed for 1 rd
Searing Smite (R1 Evoc): Self weapon inflicts +1d6 HP fire, target suffers 1d6 HP fire/rd (Con ends per-rd damage) for conc or 1 min
Magic Notes:
Artificer Initiate: Know 1 A0 spell, cast 1 A1 spell 1/long rest
Chef: Food prepared during short rest heals 1d8 HP for 8 targets; treats prepared during long rest give 4 temporary HP to 4 targets
Distant Spell: Spend 1 Sorcery Point to dbl spell range or touch at 30'
Eldritch Spear: R300' Eldritch Blast
Fey Touched: Cast Misty Step and 1 level 1 Divination or Enchantment spell 1/long rest
Nature's Veil: Self becomes invisible for 1 rd 4/long rest
Primal Awareness: Cast Speak With Animals, Beast Sense, Speak With Plants 1/long rest
Shadow Touched: Cast Invisibility and 1 level 1 Illusion or Necromancy spell 1/long rest
Spellcasting Focus: Use druidic focus for ranger spells
Subtle Spell: Spend 1 Sorcery Point to cast w/out somatic or verbal components
Telekinetic (Charisma): Cast Mage Hand
Telekinetic (Intelligence): Cast Mage Hand
Telekinetic (Wisdom): Cast Mage Hand
Telepathic: Cast Detect Thoughts 1/long rest
Notes
* Ability Boost: +1 charisma; +1 wisdom;
